member.name: T:RPChess.MoveDirection
member.summary: This enum matches words to cardinal directions (Forward, ForwardRight, BackwardLeft, ...). This adheres to the standards of trigonometry: Each direction is the radian angle * 4/PI

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.Right
member.summary: Right = 0

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.FowardRight
member.summary: ForwardRight = 1

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.Forward
member.summary: Forward = 2

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.ForwardLeft
member.summary: ForwardLeft = 3

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.Left
member.summary: Left = 4

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.BackwardLeft
member.summary: BackwardLeft = 5

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.Backward
member.summary: Backward = 6

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveDirection.BackwardRight
member.summary: BackwardRight = 7

member.name: T:RPChess.MoveType
member.summary: Enum for determining which type of move the class is implementing.

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveType.Capture
member.summary: Capture is the standard chess move.

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveType.Movement
member.summary: Movement handles a pieces movement across the board.

member.name: F:RPChess.MoveType.Attack
member.summary: Attack has no movement only deals/heals damage to pieces.

member.name: T:RPChess.BoardVector
member.summary: This is a struct that matches a distance and a direction for use on board topology.

member.name: F:RPChess.BoardVector.Direction
member.summary: The direction of the vector, enum.

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardVector.toOffset
member.summary: Converts the Vector to an offset stored in BoardLocation, uses Sin and Cos to form the X and Y offsets.
member.returns: the offset relatively equivalent to this vector

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardVector.fromOffset(RPChess.BoardLocation)
member.summary: Creates a vector from an X,Y offset.
member.param: The offset to convert this vector to.

member.name: P:RPChess.BoardVector.Length
member.summary: The length of the vector. It can only be positive and maxes at the sqrt(Int32.MaxValue) for use of pythagorean theorem.

member.name: T:RPChess.BoardLocation
member.summary: This is a simple X,Y pair that is used for storing locations and offsets.

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardLocation.op_Addition(RPChess.BoardLocation,RPChess.BoardLocation)
member.summary: Adds two BoardLocations together.

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardLocation.op_Equality(RPChess.BoardLocation,RPChess.BoardLocation)
member.summary: An equality comparison.
member.returns: True if the X and Y values are both equal.

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardLocation.op_Inequality(RPChess.BoardLocation,RPChess.BoardLocation)
member.summary: An inequality comparison.
member.returns: False if the X and Y values are both equal.

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardLocation.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Objet equals override
member.returns: True if these are the same object.

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardLocation.GetHashCode
member.summary: hashcode override

member.name: M:RPChess.BoardLocation.ToString
member.summary: To String override for easier debugging and testing.
member.returns: A string representation of the form: ( int, int )

member.name: P:RPChess.BoardLocation.X
member.summary: The X axis(horizontal) offset. Positive goes right. The maximum absolute Value is the sqrt(Int32.MaxValue).

member.name: P:RPChess.BoardLocation.Y
member.summary: The Y axis(vertical) offset. Positive goes up. The maximum absolute Value is the sqrt(Int32.MaxValue).

member.name: T:RPChess.Model
member.summary: The interface Model enforces the Board class to adhere to the Model-View-Controller design.

member.name: M:RPChess.Model.initialize
member.summary: Take care of any initialization that the class may have.

member.name: M:RPChess.Model.toXML
member.summary: Put all the data stored in this class into an XmlDocument for human readable/editable file storage.
member.returns: The data in a well formatted XML document

member.name: M:RPChess.Model.fromXML(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Load all of the data to this board from a well formatted XML document.
member.param: An XmlReader that points to a xml document with the data in a specific format.

member.name: P:RPChess.Model.BoardState
member.summary: An array that shows what the current state of the Board is as far as piece placement.

member.name: T:RPChess.Board
member.summary: The implementation of the Model interface.

member.name: F:RPChess.Board.Width
member.summary: The width of the board.

member.name: F:RPChess.Board.Length
member.summary: The length of the board.

member.summary: Basic constructor.

member.name: M:RPChess.Board.initialize
member.summary: Initialize constructor.

member.name: P:RPChess.Board.TeamWhite
member.summary: The pieces on the White team.

member.name: P:RPChess.Board.TeamBlack
member.summary: The pieces on the Black team.

member.name: T:RPChess.BoardSpace
member.summary: An interface to hold empty board spaces and pieces.

member.name: P:RPChess.BoardSpace.isEmpty
member.summary: Simple property to check if it is an empty space.

member.name: T:RPChess.Piece
member.summary: A class that holds the stats and other data for a Game Piece that is univeral.

member.summary: Standard constructor.

member.name: M:RPChess.Piece.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Constructs a piece from XML.

member.name: M:RPChess.Piece.initialize
member.summary: Initialize any values for the Piece. Resets the HP to Maximum. Initializes all Moves in MoveSet.
member.returns: The max hp that the current hp is reset to.

member.name: M:RPChess.Piece.takeDamage(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Reduce the HP by the damage amount.
member.param: A positive amount to decrease this Piece's hp
member.returns: Current HP after damage has been taken.

member.name: M:RPChess.Piece.healHP(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Recover HP.
member.param: A positive amount to heal the piece.

member.name: M:RPChess.Piece.toXmlDocument
member.summary: Write all the piece data to a well formatted XML document for human readable storage.

member.name: P:RPChess.Piece.MAX_HP
member.summary: The Maximum HP of the piece.

member.name: P:RPChess.Piece.Name
member.summary: User defined name of the piece.

member.name: P:RPChess.Piece.MoveSet
member.summary: A set of the piece's available moves.

member.name: P:RPChess.Piece.HP
member.summary: The current HP of the piece.

member.name: P:RPChess.Piece.isEmpty
member.summary: BoardSpace interface property. For a piece it is always false.

member.summary: An interface for the different actions a Piece can do.

member.summary: Exports the properites of the Move.

member.name: T:RPChess.Attack
member.summary: A base class for attacks. Move

member.summary: Use the ability, decreases the Ability's points by 1.

member.name: M:RPChess.Attack.reset
member.summary: Resets the points to MAX_POINTS.

member.name: T:RPChess.AreaOfEffectAbility
member.summary: An area of effect attack for wide spread multispace attacks. Move Attack

member.name: T:RPChess.DirectionalAbility
member.summary: Directional attack for ranged attacks. Move Attack

member.name: T:RPChess.Movement
member.summary: The movement class handles topological calculations.
member.remarks: A movement is a type of move that allows the Piece to move from one space to another on the board.

member.summary: Constants for the game.

member.name: F:RPChess.Constants.MAX_BOARD_DISTANCE
member.summary: The maximum allowed distance across the board.

member.name: F:RPChess.Constants.MIN_BOARD_DISTANCE
member.summary: The minimum allowed distance across the board.

member.name: T:RPChess.Log
member.summary: A lazy mans message storage / callback. The Log class maintains a list of all moves made throughout the game.

member.name: M:RPChess.Log.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:RPChess.Log.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor that also initializes.

member.name: M:RPChess.Log.initialize
member.summary: Initializes the _moveList. Emptys it if there were entrys.

member.name: M:RPChess.Log.add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a move to the Log.
member.param: A string containing the piece moved, and the move it made.

member.name: M:RPChess.Log.peek
member.summary: An easy method to get the last move on the log without instantiating a new Array.

member.name: M:RPChess.Log.Clear
member.summary: Clears the log.
member.returns: Returns the number of entries cleared.

member.name: P:RPChess.Log.MoveList
member.summary: An immutable array of Strings that allows all other classes in the RPChess

member.name: P:RPChess.Log.Count
member.summary: The number of moves in the Log.
